About

Hello! I am a MS-PhD Integrated student in Hacking Lab at KAIST. I am advised by Prof. Insu Yun. Previously, I was at Networking and Mobile Systems Lab, led by Prof. Sung-Ju Lee. My research interest spans across various topics in mobile systems and software security. I worked on projects that delve deeply into the Android OS. Currently, I am interested in designing and building practical solutions for real-world software security problems, such as designing a secure data sharing protocol for wearable devices and automatic exploit generation for vulnerable smart contracts.

I received my Bachelerâ€™s degree from KAIST in 2022, majoring in Computing Sciences and minoring in Intellectual Property.
